duties_responsibilities.duty: Implements and modifies engineered labor standards in warehouse operations.
Supports regional operations projects and recommends efficient and cost-effective solutions.
Trains warehouse and delivery staff in efficient and safe work methods.
Performs process simulations to assess impact on labor productivity and incentive programs.
Serves as a subject matter expert in work methods, labor standards, and efficiency techniques.
Monitors warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity metrics and identify opportunities for efficiencies.
Maintains high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Industrial Engineering degree preferred)
